plugin

Interface PluginListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HelpMenu, PluginAddedLogger, ToolsMenu

    public interface PluginListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The interface PluginListener that defines the methods that have to be used by all the plugin listeners
    Author:
    Thomas OSTROWSKI - Valentin BOMY

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pluginAdded(java.io.File file)
      The action that will be done when a plugin is added.
      void pluginRemoved(java.io.File file)
      The action that will be done when a plugin is removed.

    • Method Detail

      • pluginAdded

        void pluginAdded(java.io.File file)
        The action that will be done when a plugin is added.
        Parameters:
        file - the file that will be used as a plugin

      • pluginRemoved

        void pluginRemoved(java.io.File file)
        The action that will be done when a plugin is removed.
        Parameters:
        file - the file that will be used as a plugin
